Shellie and Adam say their goal is for Nathan to be happy and enjoy his life. Nathan’s ultimate goal is to be able to walk independently. Since 1978, the Nelson County Schools have received $950,000 in Crusade funding, which has given children like Nathan that extra boost to help them fulfill their potential.

Go to WHASCrusade.org to learn more about the WHAS Crusade for Children. 100% for the kids!
